00018 #ifndef CORRESPONDENCE_H
00019 #define CORRESPONDENCE_H
00020 
00021 #include "stdincludes.h"
00022 #include "GPixel.h"
00023 
00028 class Correspondence {
00029 public:
00030   GPixel        i;
00031   GPixel        j;
00032 };
00033 
00034 
00037 inline std::istream &operator >>(std::istream &in, Correspondence &c) {
00038   in >> c.i.id >> c.j.id >> c.i.x >> c.i.y >> c.j.x >> c.j.y;
00039   return(in);
00040 }
00041 
00042 
00045 inline std::ostream &operator <<(std::ostream &out, Correspondence &c) {
00046   out << c.i << " <-> " << c.j;
00047   return(out);
00048 }
00049 
00050 #endif
